title: Hunter missing color hand-cut scrap in PSA 4 holder
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Hunter missing color hand-cut scrap in PSA 4 holder
posts.post_content:
The grader was in a great mood the day he looked at this one.  One of the cooler scraps I've owned.  

The second card is just shown for comparison.  I don't own that one anymore.

$1000 shipped and insured (within the US).  Price assumes a no-fee payment method, and I have to collect sales tax from WA state buyers.
